DOC.brief_summary: Obesity associate decrease skeletal muscle insulin sensitivity . Aerobic exercise increase insulin sensitivity hour follow exercise , however cellular mechanism completely understood . The current project investigate mechanism exercise improvement skeletal muscle insulin sensitivity .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Insulin Signaling Human Skeletal Muscle
DOC.detailed_description: Study Overview : We investigate mechanism exercise improve response skeletal muscle insulin lean obese adult . Participants complete 4 study visit consist : 1 ) screen visit , 2 ) maximal exercise test visit , randomize order 3 ) rest metabolic study visit , 4 ) exercise metabolic study visit . Metabolic study visit rest exercise condition identical , remain sedentary performing exercise . Skeletal muscle biopsy sample collect resting , immediately post-exercise insulin stimulate condition .
DOC.criteria: Males Females Aged 1845 year Normal weight ( body mass index [ BMI ] 1825 kg/m2 ) obese ( BMI 3040 kg/m2 ) Sedentary ( < 1 hour plan physical activity per week ≥ 6 month ) Weight stable ( < 2 kg change body mass ≥ 6 month ) Nonsmokers ( tobacco nicotine use ≥ 1 year ) Hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 90mmHg ) Chronic health condition include diabetes , cardiovascular disease , treat hypertension , cancer , anemia , uncontrolled hyper hypothyroidism . Pregnant , nursing , irregular menses postmenopausal ( female ) Hyperglycemia ( fast glucose > 126 mg/dl ) Hypercholesterolemia ( fast LDL > 140mg/dl ) Hemoglobin < 13.0 g/dl ( male ) , < 11.5 g/dl ( female ) Compromised renal function ( outside 135145 mmol/L sodium , 3.55.1 mmol/L potassium ) Lidocaine allergy Medications include βblockers , angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor , insulin , thiazolidinediones , metformin , sulfonylurea , chronic nonsteroidal antiinflammatory use , anticoagulant ( e.g . warfarin ) , current antibiotic , opiate , monoamine oxidase inhibitor , benzodiazepine , others may impact study outcome Any physical limitation prevents participant safely complete exercise test Due risk associate current protocol , individual diminish capacity consent exclude . Similarly , due need constant , accurate participant monitor metabolic study activity , participant need clearly understand verbal write English . Participants clearly understand verbal write English exclude .
